raw_text: Anumber of techniques have been investigated, including cosine similarity of feature vectors (Attaliand Burstein, 2006), often combined with dimensionality reduction techniques such as Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA) (Landauer et al, 2003), and generative machine learning models (RudnerandLiang, 2002) as well as discriminative ones (Yannakoudakis et al, 2011)
clean_text: A number of techniques have been investigated, including cosine similarity of feature vectors (Attali and Burstein, 2006), often combined with dimensionality reduction techniques such as Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA) (Landauer et al, 2003), and generative machine learning models (Rudner and Liang, 2002) as well as discriminative ones (Yannakoudakis et al, 2011).

citing_paper_authors: Marion, Zepf | Detmar, Meurers | Adriane, Boyd
raw_text: We extend our n-gram-based data-driven prediction approach from the Helping Our Own (HOO) 2011 Shared Task (Boyd and Meurers, 2011) to identify determiner and preposition errors in non-native English essays from the Cambridge Learner Corpus FCE Dataset (Yannakoudakis et al, 2011) as part of the HOO 2012 Shared Task
clean_text: We extend our n-gram-based data-driven prediction approach from the Helping Our Own (HOO) 2011 Shared Task (Boyd and Meurers, 2011) to identify determiner and preposition errors in non-native English essays from the Cambridge Learner Corpus FCE Dataset (Yannakoudakis et al, 2011) as part of the HOO 2012 Shared Task.
